content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE DimDate (
	[DateSK] int,
	[DateValue] date,
	[DateYear] smallint,
	[DateMonth] int,
	[DateDay] int,
	[DateDayOfWeek] int,
	[DateDayOfYear] smallint,
	[DateWeekOfYear] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Date/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_southridgedatalake02_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDeltaFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.DimDate
GO
